thread.title: All-day breakfast coming to Colorado McDonald's restaurants
thread.title_full: All-day breakfast coming to Colorado McDonald's restaurants - The Denver Post

author: Alicia Wallace
title: All-day breakfast coming to Colorado McDonald's restaurants
text:
The late-night — or, for that matter, late-morning — craving for an Egg McMuffin can now be fulfilled.
Starting Tuesday, McDonald's will serve breakfast items all day at its Colorado restaurants, as part of a national push by the fast-food giant to capitalize off what is its best-performing part of the day.
All-day breakfast menus at the more than 200 McDonald's in Colorado are expected to include the following items, which could vary by location: Egg McMuffin, Sausage McMuffin with Egg, Sausage McMuffin, Hotcakes with Sausage, Hotcakes, Sausage Burrito, Fruit 'N Yogurt Parfait, Fruit & Maple Oatmeal and Hash Browns.
To promote the launch, McDonald's officials said participating locations will host a PJ Day on Wednesday during which patrons who don pajamas — shirts and shoes required — will receive a free Egg McMuffin.
The initiative is one of several from McDonald's to improve its top and bottom lines. Guest counts fell by 4.1 percent in 2014, leading to annual sales falling 5.2 percent to $26 billion that year.
McDonald's overhauled its executive team last year to help streamline the operation and lead changes that include reducing menu items, developing a mobile app and taking a stab at the fast-casual market.
